review: Love it!  My workout videos were purchased through prime and fire tv allows me to load them up and steam within seconds. I also love watching all my shows on tv as opposed to my laptop. I'm really glad they included games and I will be purchasing some soon. (I've already played and enjoyed some of the free ones.)My only complaint is with the twitch app. It seems that you can only watch the most popular streams and you have to really dig to find anything that's not on the front page. I wish they would add a category search and user name search feature.
author: Rachel

Also lack integration with other apps like net flixs apps. Should be expanded to allow voice searching within a 3rd party app.
